name: Grab The Flag (Swordscode)
description:
PvE game with no loading time.

Funny AI based interactive characters.

GOD mode.

Small in size, uses way less memory.

Unique character abilities:

- Evan punches really hard.

- Codi's boomerang can hit you twice.

- Beware of Dan's flames.

- And finally, better keep your distance from Talia.
